Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits unfair residential real estate service agreements
Summary: Prohibits unfair residential real estate service agreements which are certain service agreements which are not to be performed within two years following the time such agreement is entered into.
LawCode: Amd ยง778-aaa, Gen Bus L (as proposed in S.6361-B & A.5886-C)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting unfair residential real estate service agreements
